title: Champion mastery system
body:
Hi guys,

Just wanted to get your attention if possible regarding champion mastery system. In my opinion, it is very unbalanced. For instance, my main champs are support and it is nearly impossible to get "S" when you play support. I had games with scores like 4/2/23 which I believe is a good score for a support but would only get like an "A" grade. I also play tanky tops and tanky junglers like Amumu, Maokai... Lots of utility but not many kills. Again, same story, great score but "A" rating. Even with utility mages in mid it is hard to get "S" let alone "S+". From what I've seen so far, ADC and assassin type junglers and mid can easily get "S" which in my opinion isn't really fair. I think supports and tanks would also like to get some good rankings and some chests. I don't know what this system is based on, from what I understand, it takes KDA and CS into consideration which is something supports and even tanks don't get a lot of. Maybe if the system knew which role someone is playing, it could take into consideration that a support won't get kills and CS but is still of great value to the team.
Hope you get some time to look into this issue, if you consider it to be an issue. :)
Cheers! 
{{champion:25}}

replies.body: Really? I find it easy to get S ranks with supports, but not anywhere else lol. What are your wards like? That's a big part of how supports are scored too.

Honestly, my wards are decent but not great. :) I get S with supports but it felt much harder than when playing adc or assassins. I'm obviously doing something wrong then! :) Time to step up the wards game then! Thanks for the tip!
I got a 'S+' as support blitzcrank a week ago. I just played it safe.
